snippet: The case mystified me at the time ; but as too much mystery invariably defeats its own ends, I will try to put it down in a way that will make it considerably plainer to the reader. One bitter cold night in January, about two hours after midnight, a youth of seventeen or eighteen staggeringly fought his way along Waterloo Place towards the Calton Hill.
